mapper.select: /*schedule.auto_customer*/ SELECT * FROM customer where c_tel LIKE '%' || #{c_tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'

/*schedule.search_customer*/ SELECT customer.c_name as c_name, car_number, car_name, car_size, car_category, car_fuel_type FROM customer , car where customer.c_tel = car.c_tel and car.c_tel = #{c_tel}
/*schedule.search_car*/ SELECT car_number car_size, car_category, car_fuel_type FROM car where car_number = #{car_number}

/*schedule.Calendar*/ select to_char(s_date, 'YYYY') as year ,to_char(s_date, 'MM') as month ,to_char(s_date, 'DD') as day ,(select c_name from customer where c_tel = schedule.c_tel) as name from schedule where to_char(s_date, 'YY') = to_char(sysdate, 'YY')

/*schedule.Select_schedule*/ SELECT c_tel ,car_number ,(select c_name from customer where customer.c_tel = s.C_TEL) as name ,s_contents ,to_char(s_date, 'YY/MM/DD HH24') as s_date FROM schedule s WHERE substrb(s_date, 0, 8) = to_date(#{s_date}, 'YY/MM/DD')

/*schedule.Select_schedule*/ Select car_number ,car_name ,car_oil_date ,car_km ,car_fuel_type ,cs.c_tel ,cs.c_name ,cs.c_gender ,cs.c_email ,cs.c_comment from car , CUSTOMER cs where CAR_NUMBER = #{car_number} and cs.c_tel = #{c_tel}
